snippet: Pakistan’s foreign-language Oscar contender was filmed in a disputed zone between that country and India.
abstract: Pakistan’s foreign-language Oscar contender was filmed in a disputed zone between that country and India.
lead_paragraph: The making of “Dukhtar,” Pakistan’s submission for the Oscar for best foreign-language film, is almost as compelling a story as the one the movie tells.

headline.main: Avoiding Sectarian Violence to Tell a Story That Refused to Go Away
